ygData.messageBody:
my wife was the same way when she also played shada and now with her cleric.
i know it is hard to change old habits, i used to be stuck on the mouse too,
but one of the best things you can do for yourself is do whatever you have
to in order to break that habit and get using hotkeys. they really make
playing 1000% better, for all classes and especially for bards. and the new
10-slot hotkey banks are just icing on the cake.

Shada

> Plus I'm one of those people that never quite
> got the hang of
> using hotkeys for songs. I'm pretty much stuck on the old mouse for
> twistings, which makes it a little harder to switch songs/instruments.
